name: RockSolid PSF
tagline: Drupal dev company with world-wide experience
description:
RockSolid PSF is a Ukrainian IT-company that architects, develops and maintains Drupal-based web-applications and sites. We create bleeding-edge products, help support and upgrade legacy systems for our Clients to accept the challenges of the modern business ecosystem.
Our main focus:
completely new Drupal-based projects planning and development
eCommerce
custom Drupal modules development
responsive Drupal-theming
headless Drupal-based REST-servers for mobile apps, web-apps and systems
*Any* to Drupal 8 migration
support and maintenance
performance optimization of Drupal-based web-apps
Established in 2013 we gained the trust of our clients with expert solutions, high quality of final products, willingness to collaborate and solve complicated tasks same as day-to-day routine.
RockSolid PSF's developers work directly with clients from 26+ countries from our offices in Kyiv and Lutsk. All our in-house developers communicate directly with each other mentoring and sharing knowledge.
